extendedInfo.description: A wallpaper featuring a collection of stunning oil paintings embracing an ocean theme by artist Tony Coles.This is an Ad supported version. Please purchase the paid version of this app if you do not wish to receive advertisements.Tony Coles is an Australian artist based on the Sunshine Coast, Queensland.The inspiration for his work is derived from direct observation of his surroundings and life. His work makes the communication and feelings its axis. He is interested in painting the synthesis of elemental weights, space, air, and volume with emphasis given to these through the use of a full-bodied Australian light.Tony's work has won awards and appeared in exhibitions around Australia. He also does paintings on a commission basis and provides private art tuition.Proceeds from the sale of this app go to the artist.Please checkout Tony's website at www.tonycoles.com.au

reviews.title: Stunning art!
reviews.comment: Beautiful oil paintings by a talented artist with a beach/ocean theme to bring style to your phone!
reviews.author: A Google User
